issue.title: [Go][IPC] Implement Compression handling for IPC
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12168](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12168). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add implementation for handling the optional compression for reading/writing Arrow IPC Format.
